member.name: Gdiplus.GetPixelFormatSize
member.summary: The GetPixelFormatSize method returns the number of bits per pixel used by a specified pixel format.
member.param: A PixelFormat constant that specifies the pixel format to be tested.
member.returns: This method returns the number of bits per pixel used by the specified pixel format.

member.name: Gdiplus.IsAlphaPixelFormat
member.summary: The IsAlphaPixelFormat method determines whether a specified pixel format has an alpha component.
member.param: A PixelFormat constant that specifies the pixel format to be tested.
member.returns: If the pixel format has an alpha component, this method returns TRUE; otherwise, it returns FALSE.

member.name: Gdiplus.IsCanonicalPixelFormat
member.summary: The IsCanonicalPixelFormat method determines whether a specified pixel format is one of the canonical formats: PixelFormat32bppARGB or PixelFormat64bppARGB.
member.param: A PixelFormat constant that specifies the pixel format to be tested.
member.returns: If the pixel format is PixelFormat32bppARGB or PixelFormat64bppARGB, this method returns TRUE; otherwise, it returns FALSE.

member.name: Gdiplus.IsExtendedPixelFormat
member.summary: The IsExtendedPixelFormat method determines whether a specified pixel format uses 16 bits per color channel.
member.param: A PixelFormat constant that specifies the pixel format to be tested.
member.returns: If the pixel format uses 16 bits per color channel, this method returns TRUE; otherwise, it returns FALSE.

member.name: Gdiplus.IsIndexedPixelFormat
member.summary: The IsIndexedPixelFormat method determines whether a specified pixel format is an indexed format.
member.param: A PixelFormat constant that specifies the pixel format to be tested.
member.returns: If the pixel format is an indexed format, this method returns TRUE; otherwise, it returns FALSE.
